Module HW05
Package model.paint

Class ADecoratorPaintStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.paint.APaintStrategy
      • model.paint.ADecoratorPaintStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPaintStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FixedColorDecoratorPaintStrategy
    public abstract class ADecoratorPaintStrategy
extends APaintStrategy
    Abstract class that provides default behavior for subclasses that will decorate another IPaintStrategy to add functionality to that strategy. All this class's methods do is to simply delegate to the decoree. A subclass should override one or more methods, adding additional processing either before or after delegating to the decoree. Note that this class cannot be used by the BallWorld system directly as it lacks a no-parameter constructor.
    Author:
    Peter
